result.eng: When he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ga: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.orig: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.html: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ponchtml: Ar imeaċt dó dúirt Fionn go mbeaḋ sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.

result.eng: I just said that for fun.
result.ga: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.orig: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.html: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.html: Dúirt mé an praghas leisI told him the price.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé an praġas leisI told him the price.

result.eng: I said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.
result.ga: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidin
result.orig: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidin
result.html: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidinI said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-ṁoċ ar maidinI said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.

result.html: Dúirt mé léi imeachtI told her to leave.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé léi imeaċtI told her to leave.

result.ga: Dúirt sé i gcogar liom é
result.orig: Dúirt sé i gcogar liom é
result.html: Dúirt sé i gcogar liom éHe whispered it to me.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt sé i gcogar liom éHe whispered it to me.

result.html: Dúirt sí an pasfhocalShe said the password.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt sí an pasḟocalShe said the password.

result.eng: She said the pub was closed.
result.ga: Dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.orig: Dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.html: Dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt sí go raiḃ an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.

result.eng: As for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ga: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.orig: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.html: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat achAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ponchtml: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat aċAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...

result.eng: Like I said the other day, ...
result.ga: Mar a dúirt mé an lá cheana
result.orig: Mar a dúirt mé an lá cheana
result.html: Mar a dúirt mé an lá cheanaLike I said the other day, ...
result.ponchtml: Mar a dúirt mé an lá ċeanaLike I said the other day, ...

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.ga: Ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.orig: Ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.html: Ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.
result.ponchtml: Ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.
